players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night; she is mafia. Alice knows I'm detective. Bob, you should vote her out."
You: "Bob, you seem too quiet. Charlie, your claim is suspicious. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I think Charlie is mafia; if he were detective, Alice wouldn't know. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: remained silent.
You: " text. So final message: 'Alice: MESSAGE: "
Bob: " text"

Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
